channel.title: Voting bot
channel.description:
Hey guys , I think i found a server using a voting bot. It's called DyNamic PvP and it has like 10+ Votes every minute. It has been on the server status for like 2-3 days and has 9k votes!??!
I checked it and it only has 20 players online, and about 10-30 votes a minute. I was just wondering how they make that and if they will get banned for using voting bots.

item.title: Voting bot
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Thank you for pointing this out. We’re investigating the server currently so it shouldn’t be too long before we reach a conclusion.

Read full topic

item.description:

report status list stuff directly to the administration

Read full topic
